title: rioter please explain
body: I have been 14 day banned from a hacker accessing my account via a third party program, i contacted a rioter via ticket and she said there is nothing she can do because of how severe the profanity the hacker said was. But that didnt make sense to me but i didnt want to pursue the rioter further given her stance, can someone explain it to me or help me it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: If you've already spoken with an agent in your ticket, their decision is going to be the final one essentially, but I can still provide a bit of context for you. The agent looked over your account, and there weren't any signs of it being hacked or compromised in any way. Without any evidence of someone hacking your account, it's difficult to say that the ban was issued because of the actions of someone else.

there is not much i can provide unless u want to see given the nature of the hack which gave him access to my pc unless you would like to see the files that were uninstalled i guess there is nothing i can do.
